Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Consultant}}, Thank you for your interest in The Independent's Guide. We are pleased to inform you that the Guide is ready to be viewed, so click here <http://www.mbopartners.com/independents-guide> to get started. You'll find that the Guide is divided into four phases: Plan, Launch, Succeed and Grow. Each phase represents a different stage of the independent consultancy career path, from getting started to expanding into a larger business.
